posts.post_content: A beautiful card: simple, elegant, no flavor text, just "Murder" in the title and three words in the text. I like this a lot. Reminds me of the M11 and M12 versions of [Day of Judgment](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Day of Judgment).

posts.post_content: Beautiful. Perfect balance, excellent flavor. I mean, Murder. MURDER. "I play Murder. That's dead." Gives [Doom Blade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doom Blade) and [Go for the Throat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Go for the Throat) a run for their money, is an excellent replacement for [Dismember](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dismember), and weaker but less color intensive than [Terminate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Terminate). I love it, 4.5/5 for sheer awesomeness.
posts.html:
Beautiful. Perfect balance, excellent flavor. I mean, Murder. MURDER. "I play Murder. That's dead." Gives Doom Blade and Go for the Throat a run for their money, is an excellent replacement for Dismember, and weaker but less color intensive than Terminate. I love it, 4.5/5 for sheer awesomeness.

posts.post_content:
Never before has a single card been so eloquent and straight forward in its text.  
  
DESTROY TARGET CREATURE.  
  
three words.  
  
and, every time i play it against my friends, I say "MMmmmuuuurrrdddeerrrrrr!!!!" in my most evil voice  
  
also, if you are teaching a friend how to play magic, and they don't understand this card, then it's time to make new friends.

Period.
